content: join w/ slip_stitch 40 single_crochet round 5 working in back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch round 6 chain 2 double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st around join w/ slip_stitch rnds 8-11 repeat rnds 6 and 7 twice round 12 chain 2 * double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 4 times double_crochet decrease single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 4 times single_crochet decrease repeat from * once more join w/ slip_stitch 36 sts round 13 repeat round 7 round 14 chain 2 * double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 3 times double_crochet in next st single_crochet decrease repeat from * three times more join w/ slip_stitch 32 sts round 15 chain 1 * single_crochet in next st double_crochet in next st 3 times single_crochet decrease repeat from * three times more join w/ slip_stitch 28 sts round 16 chain 2 * double_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st 2 times double_crochet in next st single_crochet decrease repeat from * three times more join w/ slip_stitch 24 sts round 17 working in back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 20 sts round 18 working in back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 16 sts stuff round 19 working in back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 12 sts round 20 working in back loops only chain 1 single_crochet in next st single_crochet decrease around join w/ slip_stitch 8 sts finish off leaving a 6 tail sew closed leaves w/ green first set 6 leaves row 1 working in front loops left from round 17 join w/ single_crochet in any st single_crochet in next 3 sts 4 single_crochet row 2-3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across row 4 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease across 2 single_crochet row 5 chain 1 turn single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch in the top of the last st made the single_crochet decrease finish off for the remaining leaves join w/ single_crochet in the next st to the left of the previously made leaf complete as first leaf copyright © 2006 by patti gonsalves all rights reserved this pattern is
